articles.title: Indiana prevails over Ohio State for Big Ten title - ESPN
articles.description: No. 2 Indiana defeated No. 1 Ohio State for the Hoosiers' first Big Ten championship since 1967 and likely the top seed in the College Football Playoff.
articles.content: INDIANAPOLIS -- Fernando Mendoza's 17-yard touchdown pass to Elijah Sarratt gave No. 2 Indiana the lead midway through the third quarter, and the Hoosiers' stingy defense shut down No. 1 Ohio State t… [+1993 chars]
